alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 6:52PM CST until February 01 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River at West. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Thousands of acres of agricultural land are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Black River West 15.0 17.6 Fri 5 pm CST 18.5 18.4 17.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued at 800AMSaturday morning at 700 AM CST.
